original_title: Cabinet nod to release water from Samanala-Weva for agricultural purposes
original_body_lines: Cabinet approval was granted to release the required amount of water from the Samanala-Weva reservoir for agricultural purposes, Power and Energy Minister Kanchana Wijesekera said.
He said the decision was taken while finding alternative solutions for the national power requirement.
Based on the above, the relevant authorities have been informed to release water for agricultural purposes.(Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
